title: FS/T: SGC Graded T206's PRICES REDUCED! SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: SGC Graded T206's PRICES REDUCED! SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all. These are the last 2 SGC graded T206's I have to move along. I have tried the trade route without much luck (see my previous post -"SGC 60's" for the full list of my wants). So I will try the sale route and fund my own purchases. The Schaefer is $100 ppd and the Jackson is $65 ppd. If someone wants them both, you can have them for $150 ppd (ins. $4 extra). Paypal (gift if poss.)/mo/check all good.
Thanks!
Both sold via ebay.

Last bump before ebay. Schaefer $85/Jackson $60 Both: $135 ppd.
Thanks!
